chapters.title: Chapter 8: Sea Folk and Kin
chapters.info: Zarya Alkaese, p. 193 (215)—Real name of Garenia, the name she used as a novice before Vandene and Adeleas left on their retreat to Tifan's Well. She has a strong nose and a wide mouth. She is actually over ninety, but she looks like she is not yet into middle age. See also Rosoinde, Garenia.
